group_1.textRight: Yoohoo, Momoko!

group_1.textLeft: Woah, Coordinator?!@[chara:101001:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101001:cheek_0][chara:101001:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:101001:lipSynch_1]Don't just suddenly hug my arm like that.
In any case, are you sure you should be here?

group_1.textRight: As expected, everyone's gathering here.
This Coordinator decided to take a break @today and came to visit Kanagi.
Hmm, I missed you.

group_1.textLeft: Kanagi, thank you again for coming today.
Yes, you must be very busy with @your work at the maid cafe.

group_1.textRight: Don't worry about it.
I'll be joining you again since @I'm in charge of the East.
Also, I asked Madam to cover my shift this evening.

group_1.textLeft: So Kanagi is actually a maid!

group_1.textRight: Hmm, if Tamaki's little sister is a good girl too, @then I hope you can come and see me.
As my master, I will treat you @with the utmost  respect.

group_1.textLeft: By the way, I have something to ask you, Mitama.

group_1.textRight: Hmm?@What is it, Tsuruno?

group_1.textLeft: We were talking to Touka earlier.
Is it true that Mirrors can be used @to connect to other universes?
Mitama was the one managing Endless Mirrors...

group_1.textRight: More accurately, I keep track of who's going in.
Incidentally, that story is true.
Kanagi and I went in with them.
That's right.

group_1.textLeft: We haven't seen the Mirrors Witch in a long time...
I was worried about that too.

group_1.textRight: Of course, that was something we also feared,@but this time we were only experimenting.
Yup yup.
I also came up with a way to stop the @experiment if it goes wrong!
Never underestimate a genius!

group_1.textLeft: Even geniuses lose their footing @when it comes to the unknown.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100701:effect_emotion_angry_0][se:7219_strain]Nya~!

group_1.textLeft: Are you really sure you can call upon the power @that defeated that Witch again...?

group_1.textRight: At the very least, it's certain that Mirrors has @become more complicated and aberrant,
and it has begun creating entrances @to other dimensions.
Indeed...

group_1.narration: ―Iroha―@I met Kanagi relatively recently.@Kanagi had noticed something@strange going on in Kamihama@so she helped us out.
―Yachiyo―@Back then, it was me and Mifuyu in the West,@in an uphill battle against Kanagi of the East.@It's a miracle that we can work together like this now.
―Iroha―@Also, Mitama has been strengthening@my magical power since I met her,@and she's been helping me in various ways.
―Iroha―@When I learned of Mitama's wish,@I was really surprised.
―Yachiyo―@But still, here we are,@our town is still standing strong,@and most importantly, we're moving forward.
―Iroha―@One person, two people, three people.@Little by little, we'll join hands to form a circle,@and move forward together.
